title: Take Me Home
description: You are on your smoke break at Walmart. You look down and see a box: inside is a ceramic lamb with a note around its neck asking you to take it home. Do you: a) burn it; b) throw it in the trash, or c) take it home?
itunes:title: Take Me Home
itunes:subtitle: Take Me Home
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and WNYC Studios
